data.title: STILL HAVE A LOT OF FREE CLEAN FILL DIRT
data.description:
We keep on digging so have much more. 
Free clean fill dirt. A lot of it - see picture. 
Please do not ask if i can deliver. We only supply the free dirt. Make an appointment and get it. I may be able to help load at your own risk and liability.
